about_the_game:
Secrets of the Tundra is a 2D Top-Down Boss Rush game inspired by Shadow of the Colossus, Titan Souls, and Zelda. You are a greedy man in search of riches in the Tundra. Destroy the spirits to get what you always desired but for what price? Go forth and find the Secrets of the Tundra!

Bosses


The bosses are the Crystal Spirits of the Tundra, and you are not sure why they are there. Each spirit is unique in that some are even puzzles that you have to figure out how to defeat. Crystal Spirits are made out of rocks and crystals from the land of the Tundra and are a big part of the Secrets of the Tundra.

Abilities


The crystal sword that you get gives you special abilities like being able to dash away from danger and attack the Crystal Spirits. You can even dash attack the spirits which will help you on your journey to destroying the Crystal Spirits.
